text: Hollin Well and Annesley (Also spelt Hollinwell and Annesley) railway station is a former station on the Great Central Railway on the section from Nottingham Victoria to Sheffield Victoria. The station was opened in November 1901 and closed in September 1962. It was one of the earliest closures on the section from Nottingham to Sheffield. ==Present day== The site has been grazed and nothing remains of the site other than humps in the ground around the site. The site was close to the Nottingham Golf Course with no access road to the station. ==Former services== ==References== http://www.disused- stations.org.uk/h/hollin_well_annesley/index.shtml https://www.railscot.co.uk/locations/H/Hollinwell_And_Annesley/ https://www.nottsgolfclub.co.uk/heritage/the-club/ Category:Former Great Central Railway stations
title: Hollin Well and Annesley railway station
